job description:
MUST HAVE hands on Big Data experience

Top Skills
  • SQL
  • Data Lake (Huge portion of the role)
  • Teradata
  • Healthcare experience must
  • Local to Chicago
Systems Analyst (Data Lake)
Downtown Chicago, IL
Duration: 6-12 months

Job Purpose:

This position is responsible for designing enhancements and new business applications and/or information systems solutions through integration of technical and business requirements; serving as technical designer to identify best solution and resulting technical specifications within limits of code environment; linking Business Analyst needs and Architect definition to technical solutions.

Required Job Qualifications:
  • Bachelor Degree and 5 + years Information Technology OR Technical Certification and/or College Courses and 7+ years Information Technology experience OR 6 years Information Technology experience.
  • 5 years + of data mapping, data modeling and data profiling expertise
  • 5 years + of coding and development/architecture experience
  • Must be very strong with SQL skills, Data Lake and Teradata technologies and have previous experience as a Systems Analyst working with these technologies.
  • Experience in creating mapping rules from source to target with transformations
  • Support Data integrity in various environments
  • Knowledge of application configuration
  • Knowledge of Integration Technologies such as DataStage / Talend / COBOL / Big Data
  • Knowledge of Data Modeling, Data Warehousing and ETL concepts
  • Strong SQL skills
  • Knowledge of at least one RDBMS such as DB2 / Teradata
  • Exposure to Big Data patterns and data formats
  • Strong data profiling and analysis skills
  • Requirements definition & management
  • SDLC Methodology - Agile / Scrum / Iterative Development
  • Experience with code optimization and performance tuning
  • Conceptual thinking
  • Creative thinking
  • Problem solving and analytical thinking
  • Strong oral/written communication skills
Preferred Job Qualifications:
  • Bachelor’s Degree and 5 + years Information Technology OR Technical Certification and/or College Courses and 7 + years Information Technology experience OR 7 + years Information Technology experience.
  • Must be very strong with SQL skills, Data Lake and Teradata technologies and have previous experience as a Systems Analyst working with these technologies.
  • Strong experience with JIRA or some other related Agile management tooling like Rally, Microsoft TFS. Be able to take user stories and work with teams to organize them into tasks, sprints, releases as well as some experience in backlog grooming, change management tasks, etc.
  • Soft Skills, strong written & oral skills
  • Ability to explain technical details
  • Strong analytical skills and problem-solving skills
  • Requirements definition & management
  • SDLC Methodology - Agile / Scrum / Iterative Development
  • Healthcare experience
